p: Determination of the mineral content (ash) and analysis of the mineral elements were made on dry samples via the AOAC method no. 930.05. The incineration residue was extracted with 0.5 mL/mL HCl and 0.5 mL/mL HNO 3, then distilled water was added and Fe, Cu, Mn, and Zn were weighed directly [ 22, 23]. Standard solutions were used to compare absorption responses with standard analytical solutions of purity >99.9%.
